quote: The less you respond to negative people, the more positive your life will become. – Paulo Coelho
fact: Each king in a deck of playing cards represents a great king from history. Spades - King David, Clubs - Alexander the Great, Hearts - Charlemagne, and Diamonds - Julius Caesar.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What do prisoners use to call each other? Cell phones.
